Verses: 1 aneganaal Sendru, Moondraam Varushamaagaiyil, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Eliyaavukku Undaagi: Nee Poi Aagaabukku Unnaik Kaanbi; Naan Dhesaththinmel Mazhaiyaik Kattalaiyiduven Endraar.
2 appozhudhu Eliyaa Aagaabukkuth Thannaik Kaanbikkapponaan; Panjamovenil Samaariyaavile Kodidhaayirundhadhu.
3 aanapadiyaal Aagaab Aramanai Visaarippukkaaranaagiya Obadhiyaavai Azhaippiththaan; Obadhiyaa Karththarukku Migavum Bayandhu Nadakkiravanaayirundhaan.

4 yesabel Karththarin Theerkkadharisigalai Sangarikkirapodhu, Obadhiyaa Nooru Theerkkadharisigalai Serththu, Avargalaik Kebikku Aimbadhu Aimbadhu Peraaga Oliththuvaiththu, Avargalukku Appamum Thanneerum Koduththu, Avargalaip Paraamariththuvandhaan.

5 aagaab Obadhiyaavaip Paarththu: Nee Dhesaththilirukkira Ellaa Neerootrugalidaththilum, Ellaa Aarugalidaththilum Po; Naam Sagala Mirugajeevangalaiyum Saagakkodaamal, Kudhiraigalaiyum Koveru Kazhudhaigalaiyumaavadhu Uyirode Kaappaatrumpadikku Namakkup Pul Agappadumaa Endru Paar Endraan.
6 appadiye Dhesaththai Sutrip Paarkkumpadi, Adhaip Paguththukkondu, Aagaab Oru Vazhiyaayum, Obadhiyaa Veroru Vazhiyaayum Ponaargal.
7 obadhiyaa Vazhiyil Pogumpodhu, Eliyaa Avanukku Edhirppattaan; Avan Ivanai Innaan Endru Arindhu, Mugankuppura Vizhundhu, Neer En Aandavanaagiya Eliyaa Allavaa Endru Kettadharku;
8 avan, Naandhaan; Nee Poi, Idho, Eliyaa Vandhirukkiraan Endru Un Aandavanukku Sol Endraan.
9 adharku Avan: Aagaab Ennaik Kondrupodumpadikku, Neer Umadhu Adiyaanai Avan Kaiyil Oppukkodukka Naan Enna Paavam Seydhen.

10 ummaith Thedumpadi En Aandavan Manusharai Anuppaadha Jaadhiyum Raajyamum Illai Endru Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren; Neer Illaiyendru Avargal Sonnapodhu, Avan Andha Raajyaththaiyum Andha Jaadhiyaiyum Ummaik Kaanavillai Endru Saththiyam Vaangi Kondaan.
11 ippodhum Nee Poi, Un Aandavanukku, Idho, Eliyaa Vandhirukkiraan Endru Sol Endru Neer Sollugireere.

12 naan Ummai Vittupponavudane Oruvelai Karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Ummai Eduththu, Naan Ariyaadha Idaththirkuk Kondupovaar; Appozhudhu Naan Aagaabidaththirkup Poi Ariviththa Pinbu, Avan Ummaik Kaanaavittaal, Ennaik Kondrupoduvaane; Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Naan Siruvayadhumudhal Karththarukku Bayandhu Nadakkiravan.

13 yesabel Karththarin Theerkkadharisigalaik Kondrupodugirapodhu, Naan Karththarudaiya Theerkkadharisigalil Nooruperai Ovvoru Kebiyile Aimbadhu Aimbadhu Peraaga Oliththuvaiththu, Avargalukku Appamum Thanneerum Koduththu, Paraamariththuvandha Ennudaiya Seygai En Aandavanukku Arivikkappadavillaiyo?
14 ippodhum En Aandavan Ennaik Kondrupodumpadiyaaga, Neer: Idho, Eliyaa Vandhirukkiraan Endru Poi Avanukku Sol Endru Sollugireere Endraan.
15 adharku Eliyaa: Indraikku Ennai Avanukkuk Kaanbippen Endru Senaigalin Karththarukku Munbaaga Nirkira Naan Avarudaiya Jeevanaik Kondu Sollugiren Endraan.
16 appozhudhu Obadhiyaa Poi, Aagaabai Sandhiththu Avanukku Adhai Ariviththavudane, Aagaab Eliyaavai Sandhikkapponaan.
17 aagaab Eliyaavaik Kandapodhu, Aagaab Avanai Nokki: Isravelaik Kalangappannugiravan Neeyallavaa Endraan.
18 adharku Avan: Isravelaik Kalangappannugiravan Naan Alla; Karththarin Kattalaigalai Vittu Paagaalgalaip Pinpatrinadhinaal Neerum Ummudaiya Thagappan Veettaarume Isravelaik Kalangappannugiravargal.

19 ippodhum Karmel Parvadhaththile Isravelanaiththaiyum, Paagaalin Theerkkadharisigal Naanootraimbadhuperaiyum, Yesabelin Pandhiyile Saappidugira Thoppu Vikkiragaththin Theerkkadharisigal Naanooruperaiyum Ennidaththil Koottikkonduvara Aatkalai Anuppum Endraan.
20 appadiye Aagaab: Isravel Puththirar Ellaaridaththilum Aatkalai Anuppi, Karmel Parvadhaththile Andhath Theerkkadharisigalaik Koodivarumpadi Seydhaan.

21 appozhudhu Eliyaa Sagala Janaththandaikkum Vandhu: Neengal Endhamattum Irandu Ninaivugalaal Kundhikkundhi Nadappeergal; Karththar Dheyvamaanaal Avaraip Pinpatrungal; Paagaal Dheyvamaanaal Avanaip Pinpatrungal Endraan, Janangal Pradhiyuththaramaaga Avanukku Ondrum Sollavillai.
22 appozhudhu Eliyaa Janangalai Nokki: Karththarin Theerkkadharisigalil Meendhirukkiravan Naan Oruvan; Paagaalin Theerkkadharisigalo Naanootraimbadhuper.

23 ippodhum Irandu Kaalaigalai Engalidaththil Konduvarattum; Oru Kaalaiyai Avargal Therindhukondu, Adhai Sandhusandhaagath Thundiththu, Neruppup Podaamal Viragugalinmel Vaikkakkadavargal; Naan Matrak Kaalaiyai Appadiye Seydhu, Neruppup Podaamal Viragugalinmel Vaippen.

24 neengal Ungal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththai Sollik Kooppidungal; Naan Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Sollik Kooppiduven; Appozhudhu Akkiniyinaal Uththaravu Arulum Dheyvame Dheyvam Endraan; Adharku Janangalellaarum Idhu Nalla Vaarththai Endraargal.

25 appozhudhu Eliyaa Paagaalin Theerkkadharisigalai Nokki: Neengal Anegaraanadhaal Neengale Mundhi Oru Kaalaiyaith Therindhukondu Adhai Aayaththam Panni, Neruppuppodaamal Ungal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththai Sollik Kooppidungal Endraan.

26 thangalukkuk Kodukkappatta Kaalaiyai Avargal Vaangi, Adhai Aayaththampanni: Paagaale, Engalukku Uththaravu Arulum Endru Kaalaithodangi Maththiyaanamattum Paagaalin Naamaththai Sollik Kooppittaargal; Aanaalum Oru Saththamum Pirakkavillai, Maru Uththaravu Koduppaarum Illai. Avargal Kattina Palipeedaththirku Edhire Kudhiththu Aadinaargal.

27 maththiyaanavelaiyile Eliyaa Avargalaip Pariyaasampanni: Uraththa Saththamaaik Kooppidungal; Avan Dhevanaame, Avan Dhyaanaththil Iruppaan; Alladhu Aluvalaayiruppaan; Alladhu Prayaanampoyiruppaan; Alladhu Thoonginaalum Thoonguvaan; Avanai Ezhuppavendiyadhaakkum Endraan.
28 avargal Uraththasaththamaaik Kooppittu, Thangal Vazhakkaththinpadiye Raththam Thangalmel Vadiyumattum Kaththigalaalum Eettigalaalum Thangalaik Keerikkondaargal.
29 maththiyaanavelai Sendrapinbu, Andhippaliseluththum Neramattaaga Sannadham Sollikkondirundhaargal; Aanaalum Oru Saththamum Pirakkavillai, Maru Uththaravu Koduppaarum Illai, Gavanippaarum Illai.
30 appozhudhu Eliyaa Sagala Janangalaiyum Nokki: En Kitte Vaarungal Endraan; Sagala Janangalum Avan Kitte Vandhapodhu, Thagarkkappatta Karththarudaiya Palipeedaththai Avan Seppanittu;
31 unakku Isravel Ennum Per Iruppadhaaga Endru Solli, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaippetra Yaakkobudaiya Kumaararaal Undaana Koththirangaludaiya Lakkaththinpadiye, Pannirandu Karkalai Eduththu,
32 andhak Karkalaale Karththarudaiya Naamaththirkendru Oru Palipeedaththaik Katti, Palipeedaththai Sutrilum Dhaaniyam Alakkira Irandupadi Vidhai Vidhaikkaththakka Idamaana Oru Vaaikkaalai Undaakki,
33 viragugalai Adukki, Oru Kaalaiyai Sandhusandhaagath Thundiththu Viragugalin Mel Vaiththaan.

34 pirpaadu Avan: Neengal Naalukudam Thanneer Konduvandhu, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyinmelum, Viragugalinmelum Ootrungal Endraan; Pinbu Irandaandharamum Appadiye Ootrungal Endraan; Irandaandharamum Ootrinaargal; Adharkuppinbu Moondraandharamum Appadiye Ootrungal Endraan; Moondraandharamum Ootrinaargal.
35 appozhudhu Thanneer Palipeedaththai Sutrilum Odinadhu; Vaaikkaalaiyum Thanneeraal Nirappinaan.

36 andhippali Seluththum Neraththile, Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Eliyaa Vandhu: Aabragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Isravelile Neer Dhevan Endrum, Naan Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaaran Endrum, Naan Indhak Kaariyangalaiyellaam Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadi Seydhen Endrum Indraikku Vilangappannum.
37 karththaave, Neer Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endrum, Dhevareer Thangal Irudhayaththai Marupadiyum Thiruppineer Endrum Indha Janangal Ariyumpadikku, Ennaik Kettarulum, Ennaik Kettarulum Endraan.
38 appozhudhu: Karththaridaththil Irundhu Akkini Irangi, Andha Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Viragugalaiyum, Karkalaiyum, Mannaiyum Patchiththu, Vaaikkaalilirundha Thanneeraiyum Nakkippottadhu.
39 janangalellaarum Idhaik Kandapodhu, Mugankuppura Vizhundhu: Karththare Dheyvam, Karththare Dheyvam Endraargal.

40 appozhudhu Eliyaa Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Paagaalin Theerkkadharisigalil Oruvanum Thappippogaadhapadikku Avargalaip Pidiyungal Endraan; Avargalaip Pidiththapodhu, Eliyaa Avargalaik Keezhe Keeson Aatrankaraiyile Kondupoi, Ange Avargalai Vettippottaan.
41 pinbu Eliyaa Aagaabai Nokki: Neer Pom, Pojanabaanampannum; Perumazhaiyin Iraichchal Ketkappadugiradhu Endraan.
42 aagaab Pojanabaanam Pannapponaan; Pinbu Eliyaa Karmel Parvadhaththinudaiya Sigaraththinmel Eri, Tharaiyile Panindhu, Than Mugam Than Muzhangaalil Pada Kunindhu,
43 than Oozhiyakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Poi Samuththiramugamaaip Paar Endraan; Avan Poip Paarththu, Ondrum Illai Endraan; Nee Innum Ezhudharam Poip Paar Endraan.

44 ezhaandharam Ivan: Idho, Samuththiraththilirundhu Oru Manushanudaiya Ullangai Aththanai Siriya Megam Ezhumbugiradhu Endraan; Appozhudhu Avan Nee Poi, Aagaabai Nokki: Mazhai Ummaith Thadaiseyyaadhapadikku Radhaththaip Pootti, Poividum Endru Sol Endraan.
45 adharkullaaga Vaanam Megangalinaalum Kaatrinaalum Karuththu Perumazhai Undaayitru; Aagaab Radhaththil Eri Yesrayelukkup Ponaan.
46 karththarudaiya Kai Eliyaavinmel Irundhadhinaal, Avan Than Araiyaik Kattikkondu, Yesrayelukku Varumattaaga Aagaabukkumun Odinaan.
